title: Phishing Campaign Uses UpCrypter in Fake Voicemail Emails to Deliver RAT Payloads
description: Cybersecurity researchers have flagged a new phishing campaign that's using fake voicemails and purchase orders to deliver a malware loader called UpCrypter. The campaign leverages "carefully crafted emails to deliver malicious URLs linked to convincing phishing pages," Fortinet FortiGuard Labs researcher Cara Lin said. "These pages are designed to entice recipients into downloading JavaScript
